sourceMeaningMnemonic: You <radical>employ</radical> a <radical>geoduck</radical> to <kanji>review</kanji> all your work.
meaningInfo: Imagine hiring a geoduck, then ask them to review your work. Please review my writing, geoduck. Please review my record-keeping, geoduck. Please review my taxes, geoduck. This geoduck you employed can review anything for you.
readingMnemonic: As the geoduck <kanji>review</kanji>s your paperwork, it notices something surprising. You have a <ja><reading>子</reading></ja> (<ja>こ</ja>)!
readingInfo: The geoduck tells you that while it was reviewing your records, it found information about a child you have. Even you didn't know this, so you're surprised that this review geoduck found something like this.
